Summary Note:
Schnell Hinterleitner and the RM were introduced at an art auction in Vienna. They bonded over their appreciation for contemporary art and exchanged contact information to discuss potential collaborations.
Schnell Hinterleitner is a 64 year old and comes from Austria.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Schnell Hinterleitner has been happily married to Lea since 1990. Schnell and Lea have 1 child, named Franziska.
Education Background:
Schnell completed his secondary education at Akademisches Gymnasium Graz in 1978.
Schnell earned his degree from IMC University of Applied Sciences Krems in 1983.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 41 years, Schnell Hinterleitner has established himself as a key player in the industry.
In 1984, Schnell Hinterleitner started working as a Stockbroker at Conwert Immobilien Invest AG, marking the beginning of his successful career.
He then transitioned to Immofinanz AG as a Portfolio Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1989 till retirement.
